 Challenges Faced by Stokvels - One of the main challenges faced by stokvels is the lack of integration with modern financial systems. Many stokvels still rely on manual record-keeping and cash transactions, which can be time-consuming, prone to errors, and vulnerable to fraud.

 Stokvelcoin Road Map - The road map for Stokvelcoin includes phases such as initial offering and development, platform expansion and marketing, partnerships and integrations, and global expansion and diversification.
